description: The right-wing government aims to instil national pride - but teachers criticise a new curriculum.
title: Hungary's new patriotic education meets resistance
title_page: Hungary's new patriotic education meets resistance - BBC News
maintext: "The key to upward progress is the restoration of national self-esteem. So, in 2010 we set ourselves the goal of proving to ourselves - and, of course, to the world - that we are still somebody, and not the people we seemed to be, anxiously cowering as we pleaded for IMF loans and EU money.
